full_text: reporting the story Epstein was posted information before it was reported in the mainstream media. We were able to view posts on the website 4chan, frequented by far-right trolls, that were published a full 45 minutes before ABC news first reported Epstein's death. I'd like to send you the posts to verify whether the information in them is correct and whether it could have come to your team but in addition to that, do you have any statement on the situation? Thank you, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) | Reporter | BuzzFeed News PGP | Signal, WhatsApp, Telegram, Cell: +1 (613) 276 (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Send anonymous tip: contact.buzzfeed.com Page 4495 DOJ-OGR-00024378

text_blocks.content: reporting the story Epstein was posted information before it was reported in the mainstream media.

We were able to view posts on the website 4chan, frequented by far-right trolls, that were published a full 45 minutes before ABC news first reported Epstein's death. I'd like to send you the posts to verify whether the information in them is correct and whether it could have come to your team but in addition to that, do you have any statement on the situation?

additional_notes: The document contains redactions marked as (b)(6), (b)(7)(C). The content appears to be a communication between a reporter and potentially another team or individual regarding verifying information about Epstein's death posted on 4chan.
